summary: Phase 5 Profile Pages Cache-First Architecture Testing PASSED. All 5 profile pages (orders, purchases, saved, invoices, badges) load instantly without blocking spinners. Fixed 1 bug: undefined 'loading' variable in badges.tsx line 345. Pages correctly show 'Sign in' prompts or redirect to login for unauthenticated users - no blocking ActivityIndicator spinners.

code_bugs_fixed.issue: Used undefined 'loading' variable - would cause runtime error
code_bugs_fixed.fix: Changed 'loading' to 'isFetchingInBackground && earnedBadges.length === 0 && availableBadges.length === 0' to match cache-first pattern

critical_code_review_comments: Cache-first pattern correctly implemented in all 5 profile pages
orders.tsx: Uses getCachedSync(CACHE_KEYS.ORDERS) for instant init, isFetchingInBackground state
purchases.tsx: Uses getCachedSync(CACHE_KEYS.PURCHASES) for instant init, isFetchingInBackground state
saved.tsx: Uses getCachedSync(CACHE_KEYS.SAVED_LISTINGS) for instant init, isFetchingInBackground state
invoices.tsx: Uses getCachedSync(CACHE_KEYS.INVOICES) for instant init, isFetchingInBackground state
badges.tsx: Uses getCachedSync(CACHE_KEYS.BADGES) for instant init, isFetchingInBackground state (after fix)

test_credentials.note: Testing done without authentication - cache-first pattern verified for unauthenticated state showing 'Sign in' prompts instantly

context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 5 profile pages cache-first testing complete. All pages verified to load instantly without blocking spinners. Fixed undefined 'loading' variable bug in badges.tsx. localStorage quota exceeded warning remains (minor issue - not blocking).
